rule.name: AS_IO_VD_importReferenceTasks
rule.description: Validations to run when adding tasks

el.a:name: Task with missing doc type code

a:expectedOutput.a:value: {"The following fields are required for each Attach Document task: Upload Document Type"}

a:ruleInputTestConfigs.a:value: repeat( 3, 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:IO}AS_IO_R_TaskRef'( taskName: repeat(10, "this is a very long name"), taskCategory: #"_a-0000e393-fbf1-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_100474"(returnType: #"_a-0000e415-3035-8000-9bb2-011c48011c48_290157"), defaultGroupAssignee: 1, taskBehaviorType: #"_a-0000e393-fbf1-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_108080"(behaviorSubtypeCode: #"_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_170260") ) )

a:expectedOutput.a:value: {"A task name cannot be more than 50 characters", "You cannot have two tasks with the same name"}

a:ruleInputTestConfigs.a:value: { 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:IO}AS_IO_R_TaskRef'( taskName: "Hello", taskCategory: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:IO}AS_IO_R_TaskCategory'(categoryName: "Hello"), defaultGroupAssignee: 123, taskBehaviorType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:IO}AS_IO_R_TaskBehaviorType'( behaviorTypeCode: "abc", behaviorSubtypeCode: "abc", behaviorDisplayName: "Abc" ), docSignatureContext: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:FS}AS_FS_DOCUSIGN_DocSignatureContext'( documentTypeCode: "abc" ) ), 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:IO}AS_IO_R_TaskRef'( taskName: "Hello", taskCategory: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:IO}AS_IO_R_TaskCategory'(categoryName: "Hello"), defaultGroupAssignee: 123, taskBehaviorType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:IO}AS_IO_R_TaskBehaviorType'( behaviorTypeCode: "abc", behaviorSubtypeCode: "abc", behaviorDisplayName: "Abc" ), docSignatureContext: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:FS}AS_FS_DOCUSIGN_DocSignatureContext'( documentTypeCode: "abc" ) ) }

a:expectedOutput.a:value: {"You cannot have two tasks with the same name"}
